channel.title: How to play Minecraft on Iphone 3G?
channel.description: I've got an Iphone 3, And just tried to download the free Minecraft Pocket Lite App, But it says i need iOS 4.3? I cant find anywere to get this? Can anybody help me getting this and running it? Or is it just not possible for the Iphone 3g? I've got Version 4.1 on the moment i think. Cant seem to update on Itunes or anything.

item.title: How to play Minecraft on Iphone 3G?
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

Or another reason why apple sucks, windows xp is still supported by microsoft and there still are frequent updates for it.

Read full topic

item.title: How to play Minecraft on Iphone 3G?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Looks like your outta luck unless there is a port made.

macstories.net

With iOS 4.3, Apple Drops iPhone 3G Support (and iPod Touch 2nd gen)

Apple just seeded a new build of iOS, version 4.3, to developers, and it looks like they finally dropped support for the 2008 iPhone 3G. The device is indeed not listed on the iOS developer website, and nothing makes us think that future beta...

Read full topic
